name: Sumit Dalakiya
title: Mobile Application Developer | Android | Flutter
summary: Senior Mobile Application Developer with over 6 years of proficient experience in Native Android (Kotlin/Java - 5+ years) and Flutter (2+ years), complemented by core expertise in iOS (Swift). Specializes in building user-friendly, scalable, and responsive applications. Highly skilled in architectural patterns such as MVVM and Clean Architecture, with a strong focus on code maintainability and managing the full mobile development lifecycle — from initial planning to publishing on both Google Play and the App Store. Recognized for effectively solving complex technical challenges and driving measurable improvements in application performance and stability.
hintQaTextField: Ask about my roles, projects, skills and more...

projects.title: Cosmopolitan Club Chennai
projects.description: Developed an app enabling club members to view and pay bills, book games (Pickleball, Badminton) and facilities (Rooms, Banquets). Showcases all club facilities with easy access. Integrated notifications for upcoming events and updates to enhance member engagement.

projects.title: Hypex Mart
projects.description: Built an industrial e-commerce app where customers can browse and purchase equipment with ease. Features include adding items to cart, managing or creating delivery addresses, secure online payments, and real-time order tracking.

projects.title: Kanzpayday
projects.description: A financial assistance app designed to simplify employee aid applications with an intuitive and seamless experience.

projects.title: WhereGo
projects.description: A multi-app ecosystem consisting of three applications: Customer App, Vendor App, and Rider App for comprehensive delivery services.

projects.title: Zing-HRMS
projects.description: A comprehensive employee management app enabling staff to log in/out, view attendance, and manage leave requests.

projects.title: Foodie
projects.description: Allows users to explore nearby restaurants through map and list views, with detailed restaurant information and the option to view food blogger YouTube videos.

projects.title: ShareRoomz
projects.description: A property rental app where owners can list properties and seekers can browse, filter, or post requirements. It is a Myvalam's product.

projects.title: Towers Club
projects.description: Club services app with fancy UI, enabling members to book facilities, explore services, and stay updated on events.

projects.title: Doc-99 Chemist
projects.description: Online chemist shop and clinic platform with user, doctor, and pharmacist modules.

projects.title: Urja Learning App
projects.description: Gujarati learning app for 11th–12th science and NEET students; contributed to UI design, video player R&D, and Java-based improvements.

projects.title: Sale Tracking
projects.description: Developed a real-time salesman monitoring feature within a CRM system to capture salesmen's location, call history, GPS status, and device information.

projects.title: Online Music Player (2017)
projects.description: Created a demo Android app for streaming songs online with a modern player UI, featuring list-based browsing, background playback with notification and lock-screen controls.
